title: Ranked DUO - Read Thread OCE!
body: Looking for Bronze - Silver DUO Partner I Play Mid/ADC/Top preference can play jungle/support --- looking for good player with skype or vent. ADD Hades Reloaded if interested have played since vanilla silver every season atleast multiple accs however issues with retrieving some.... Please understand i am looking to climb fast with someone else who is prepared to work for it, Play Mon-Fri after work (4pm-9pm) most the time and Sat/Sun alot. Thanks.{{champion:103}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

replies.body:
Hello,
IGN: viperblits

I've played league since the end of season 3. 
At the moment I'm hovering around mid silver. (Silver IV atm).
I am a dedicated Jungle main but I can play ADC and Support reasonably well.
Champions:
Jungle: {{champion:254}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:59}} 
ADC: {{champion:236}} 
Support: {{champion:89}} {{champion:267}} 

http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/507691

Schedule:
Monday -  Wed: 5pm - 8pm
Thur:  No League
Fri :  5pm - Very late
Sat: 10am - Very Late (Some exceptions may apply)
Sunday: 10am - Afternoon, 6pm - 9pm (Some exceptions may apply).
Message me on league for my Skype contact.

I play a passive/supportive jungle play style and I am always looking for new friends to camp and get super fed. 

Regards,
Viper
you won't want to duo with this trash lmao
